entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
